title: Getting Started with Event-Driven Ansible
subtitle: Learn about the benefits and how to get started using Event-Driven Ansible.
abstract:
Event-Driven Ansible is a new way to enhance and expand automation by improving IT speed and agility while enabling consistency and resilience. Developed by Red Hat, this feature is designed for simplicity and flexibility.
